evidence.title: v1.10.7
evidence.excerpt: ## What's Changed * fix: piefed nsfw unblur @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/319 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/compare/v1.10.6...v1.10.7

evidence.title: v1.10.4
evidence.excerpt: ## What's Changed * feat: disable infinite scroll accessible pagination option by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/311 * feat: piefed comment and post emoji reactions by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/294 * fix: unable to like posts when downvotes are disabled **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/compare/v1.10.3...v1.10.4

evidence.title: v1.10.3
evidence.excerpt: ## What's Changed * feat: add reduce haptics settings toggle by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/280 * refactor: make show nsfw toggle more obvious, closes #278 by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/279 * fix: capitalization of 'comments' in saved feed filters by @Xyphyn in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/284 * fix: piefed hide read posts by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/285 * refactor: update shadcn by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/286 * chore: replace express js with vite preview by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/292 * feat: piefed feeds by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/258 * feat: piefed mark comment answer by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/293 * feat: ability to search for not founds objects via resolve object by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/300 * fix: not found search, respect instance lock and if object is from current instance by @christianjuth in https://github.com/Blorp-Labs/blorp/pull/304 * fix: site admins should have post and comment moderat…
